prodNameC: 伯樂亞 念珠菌屬抗甘露聚糖抗原（未滅菌）
ingredientsDesc: Stopping solution (ready for use) :\n1.5 N sulphuric acid
Positive control serum :\nHuman serum containing anti-mannan antibodies, tested negative for anti-HIV1 and HIV2 antibodies, HBs antigen and anti-HCV antibody.\nPreservative: <0.1% sodium azide.
Concentrated washing solution (10X)：\nTRIS-NaCl buffer (pH 7,4), 1% Tween 20\nPreservative : 0.01% de thimerosol
TMB substrate buffer (ready for use) :\nCitric acid and sodium acetate solution pH 5.2 containing 0.009% d H2O2 and 4% Dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO)
Chromogen TMB solution (concentrated) : \n90% DMSO solution containing 0.6%\nTetramethylbenzidine (TMB)

Calibrator serum : \nSolution containing human anti-mannan antibodies derived from a serum tested negative for anti-HIV1 and anti-HIV2 antibodies, HBs antigen and anti-HCV antibody, used for preparation of the range points.\nPreservative: < 0.1% sodium azide.
Negative control serum :\nHuman serum negative for anti-mannan Ab and tested negative for anti-HIV1 and anti-HIV2 antibodies, HBs antigen and anti-HCV antibody.\nPreservative: < 0.1% sodium azide.
Conjugate (ready for use) :\nPeroxidase-labelled goat anti-human lg antibody.\nPreservative: 0.01% thimerosal.
Microplate：\n12 strips of 8 wells sensitized with purified mannan prepared from a partir de C. albicans
applicantName: 美商伯瑞股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路4段126號14樓
efficacy: 以酵素免疫分析法定量人體血清中念珠菌屬抗-甘露聚糖抗體。
